comments: For a given partition cn(i,n) means the number of its parts equal to i modulo n.Short: (1=4 := 0).
maple: c := proc(L,i,n)    local a,p;    a := 0 ;    for p in L do        if modp(p,n) = i then            a := a+1 ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc:A036822 := proc(n)    local a ,p;    a := 0 ;    for p in combinat[partition](n) do        if c(p,1,5) = 0 then            if c(p,4,5) = 0 then                a := a+1 ;            end if;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2014
